description: Doubly automorphic primes: p is k-th prime, ends in k and k is itself prime.
links: Index entries for sequences related to automorphic numbers
example: p(7)=17 with 7 and 17 both primes. p(9551)=99551 with both 9551 and 99551 primes.
mathematica: Select[Prime[Prime[Range[6000000]]],PrimePi[#]==Mod[ #,10^IntegerLength[ PrimePi[#]]]&] (* The program takes a long time to run *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 05 2012 *)
author: _Felice Russo_ and _Carlos Rivera_
